snippet.title: Risk of Rain 2 - Nintendo Switch Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
The smash hit co-op roguelike of Risk of Rain 2 comes to Nintendo Switch this summer! 
Tune into the Gearbox PAX West Main Theater show on August 30th at 1:30pm PT for more info ➡http://www.twitch.tv/gearboxofficial
Follow Risk of Rain:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/riskofrain
Discord: [discord link]
Follow Gearbox Publishing:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gearboxofficial
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/gearboxofficial
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/gearbox
